description:
Many treks and adventures leave wanderers with lasting memories, and while Snufkin doesn’t usually carry a lot with him, over time he’s picked up some things that he always wants to keep close. Journey through Moominvalley with the cherished keepsakes that Snufkin takes with him wherever he can. 

This cosmetic DLC includes: 
* Blooming flowers for Snufkin’s hat
* A wooden mouthpiece for when you are lost in thought
name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Cherished Keepsakes
